name: cldrcl

stmt.origin: syl6eleq(c1, ctop, cdm(ccld), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(ccld)))
-| wceq(cdm(ccld), ctop)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ dom(Clsd))
⊣ dom(Clsd)= Top

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(ccld)))
-| wceq(cdm(ccld), ctop)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ dom(Clsd))
⊣ dom(Clsd)= Top

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wceq(cdm(ccld), ctop)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(ccld), ctop)
-| wfn(ccld, ctop)
-| wi(wfn(ccld, ctop), wceq(cdm(ccld), ctop))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wfn(ccld, ctop)
-| wi(wfn(ccld, ctop), wceq(cdm(ccld), ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ Clsd[Fn]Top
⊣ (Clsd[Fn]Top → dom(Clsd)= Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wi(wfn(ccld, ctop), wceq(cdm(ccld), ctop))

comment: Reverse closure of the closed set operation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
